title: 6: Equally weight alternative cards
message:
6: Equally weight alternative cards

Before it was just randomly picking a card from all enabled cards,
which meant that a character with multiple alternates would show up
more often than one without any.  Now we randomize on a list of
unique characters, and randomly pick one of the alternates if that
character is picked.

title: 7: Tried switching to LinearLayout dividers
message:
7: Tried switching to LinearLayout dividers

It removes some of the work but it required me to futz around with
the layouts somewhat.  Not sure how I feel about it yet but I want
to give it a shot.

message:
2: Added point sync download

It will download a new version of the points file from Matt's
server, and update the app automatically.

We'll also fallback on the asset version of the file if we fail to
load the file we downloaded (just in case).

title: Made it easier to leave config activity

Made it easier to leave config activity

now there's a "done" button which makes it obvious.  Also, up is enabled now
as well.  It all does the same thing but gives the user choice.

title: Changed the way alternate/promos work
message:
Changed the way alternate/promos work

We don't want to include both a main card AND its promo in a random
set (because most people will only have one deck).  So instead we
make sure to only count an alternate once when picking heroes.

title: Made names localizable
message:
Made names localizable

Instead of name == id, and then displaying the name throughout the
app, we have id be a user-readable id and a resId reference for
all strings.

This gives us two benefits:

1. Makes it possible to localize the application.

2. Lets us handle special cards/sets (like RANDOM) the same way as
   the rest of the cards.
